cast.overview: While under the guise of taking his family on a weekend winter getaway, Loid's attempt to make progress on his current mission Operation Strix proves difficult when Anya mistakenly gets involved and triggers events that threaten world peace.
cast.title: SPY x FAMILY CODE: White

details.biography:
Shohei Kajikawa (梶川 翔平, Kajikawa Shōhei, born June 20) is a Japanese voice actor from Osaka Prefecture who is affiliated with Kenyu Office. His former stage name was Shohei Kobayashi (小林 翔平, Kobayashi Shōhei).

After graduating from the voice actor department of Amusement Media Academy, he joined Early Wing. After leaving this agency, he joined Kenyu Office. He changed his name from Shohei Kobayashi to Shohei Kajikawa on August 15, 2010. He speaks the Kansai dialect. His special skills are naginata and drums. His hobby is visiting historical sites throughout Japan.
details.name: Shohei Kajikawa
